definition: Homer
lotus
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess

Oklahoma, US state (Tw)
pinyin: Ao4 ke4 la1 he2 ma3 Zhou1

definition: Oklahoma, US state (Tw)

sentences.english: Homer Software continues its rapid growth and is acquired for $100m.
sentences.chinese: 荷马软件保持高速成长，并以1亿美元的价格被收购。

sentences.english: Homer and Langley Collyer were found dead in their home in nineteen forty-seven.
sentences.chinese: 荷马和兰利科尔耶发现它们在一九四七年死于家。

sentences.english: When you were a young boy, you would've studied just reading and writing Homer.
sentences.chinese: 希腊男子在幼年时，要学习阅读书写荷马史诗。

sentences.english: Regulators dozing Homer Simpson-like at the switch?
sentences.chinese: 难道是监管者像荷马。辛普森那样玩忽职守？

sentences.english: They were probably there. There was an entire room with editions of Homer.
sentences.chinese: 有一整个房间里放的是荷马的作品。

sentences.english: This was in north central Oklahoma near Medford.
sentences.chinese: 这是俄克拉荷马中北部的梅德福附近。

sentences.english: Grand theft auto, larceny, robbery, arson, and suspected of murder in Oklahoma.
sentences.chinese: 偷车，盗窃，抢劫，纵火额赫拉荷马州谋杀嫌犯。

sentences.english: In The Iliad, Homer makes nine references to dogs eating dead bodies.
sentences.chinese: 《伊里亚特》中，荷马提及狗吞噬尸体多达九次。

sentences.english: Let's not fall victim to the Oklahoma sharpshooter.
sentences.chinese: 让我们不要成为俄克拉荷马州的神枪手。

sentences.english: Uncle Homayoun held her by the shoulders in an attempt to comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 荷马扬叔叔搂着她的肩试图宽慰她。

sentences.english: I'm studying Greek to read Homer in the original.
sentences.chinese: 我在学习希腊文是为了读荷马原著。

sentences.english: An American bison stands in a field on the Tallgrass Prairie Preserve in Oklahoma.
sentences.chinese: 一只北美野牛伫立在俄克拉荷马州的高草草原保护区。

sentences.english: This is an analogy as old as, and found in, Homer.
sentences.chinese: 这是在荷马史诗中就发现的类比。

sentences.english: The story of that Homeric fight got all around town.
sentences.chinese: 那场荷马式的大战立刻在全城镇里传开了。

sentences.english: Homer's Iliad   does anyone know the first line?
sentences.chinese: 荷马的《伊利亚德》，有人知道该书的首句吗？

sentences.english: Keats is referring to epic poetry when he mentions Homers proud demesne.
sentences.chinese: 慈提到荷马的骄傲的领域时，他指的是史诗。

definition: Homer's Iliad
Horace, full Latin name Quintus Horatius Flaccus (65-8 BC), Roman poet
Virgil's Aeneid (epic about the foundation of Rome)
Sophocles (496-406 BC), Greek tragedian, author of Oedipus the King
Virgil or Vergilius (70-19 BC), Roman poet and author of the Aeneid 埃涅阿斯紀|埃涅阿斯纪[Ai1 nie4 a1 si1 Ji4]
Euripides (c. 480-406 BC), Greek tragedian, author of Medea, Trojan Women etc
Shakespeare (name)/William Shakespeare (1564-1616), poet and playwright
ancient Greece
Geoffrey Chaucer (1343-1400), English poet, author of The Canterbury Tales 坎特伯雷故事集[Kan3 te4 bo2 lei2 Gu4 shi4 Ji2]
Whitman (surname)/Walt Whitman (1819-1892), American poet and journalist
Aristotle (384-322 BC), Greek philosopher
Ulysses (novel)
Aristotle (philosopher)
Aeschylus (c. 524 BC -c. 455 BC), Greek tragedian, author of The Persians, Seven against Thebes etc
Thucydides (c. 455 - c. 400 BC), Greek historian, author of the History of the Peloponnesian War
Shelley/abbr. for 珀西·比希·雪萊|珀西·比希·雪莱[Po4 xi1 · Bi3 xi1 · Xue3 lai2]
